location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, to J. Adam Esquire, Secretary to the Government at Fort William

mods.abstract: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, to J. Adam Esquire, Secretary to the Government at Fort William, acknowledging the receipt of a Command sent on 3 August 1810 regarding the British help to granting a pension to Aga Ismail, son of the late Hajer Khallul.
